mapper.select: select * from (select fb_num , title, contents,category, id, reg_date, '자유게시판' as bd_name from free_board union all select sb_num, title, contents, category, id, reg_date, '학습게시판' as bd_name from study_board union all select n_num, title, contents,'공지사항' as category, id, reg_date, '공지사항' as bd_name from notice) board where 'a' = 'a' and REG_DATE between TO_DATE('2022-09-01 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')and TO_DATE('2022-10-06 23:59:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') order by reg_date desc
